The Daily Worker and the Daily World Negatives Collection
The Daily Worker and the Daily World Negatives Collection

Preservation Hall Jazz Band and Original Tuxedo New Orleans Jazz Band, Staten Island Ferry, New York. Preservation Hall Jazz Band: Thomas Valentine (trumpet), Joseph Butler (bass), Manuel Paul (saxophone), Albert Burbank (clarinet), Charlie Hamilton (piano), Louie Nelson (trombone), Alonzo Stewart (drums) and Emanuel Sayles (banjo). Original Tuxedo New Orleans Jazz Band: Joseph Thomas (clarinet), Jeanette Kimball (piano), Frank Fields (bass), Frank Parkers (drums), Dave Bartholomew (trumpet), Albert French (banjo) and Homer Eugene (trombone). Photos by Bill Andrews.

Preservation Hall Jazz Band and Original Tuxedo New Orleans Jazz Band, Staten Island Ferry, New York. Original Tuxedo New Orleans Jazz Band: Joseph Thomas (clarinet), Jeanette Kimball (piano), Frank Fields (bass), Frank Parkers (drums), Dave Bartholomew (trumpet), Albert French (banjo) and Homer Eugene (trombone). Photos by Bill Andrews.
